page.title: 19Shopping in our block
page.content: We carried out a survey of the shopping habits of people in our block. We found that shoppers who lived in Farncombe mostly walked to the local shops but those who lived further afield came by car. Most people interviewed were local, but a few came from Godalming. The old people who were interviewed used the shops every day but most people said they used the shops only occasionally for odd items rather than their main shop of the week. The Post Office proved to be the most frequently used service. The most popular shop for produce was found to be the Co-op supermarket. Fruit and vegetables were the items that people tended to buy at the most frequent intervals. Shoppers also mentioned the lack of good parking facilities.
